topics.body:
Merry Christmas fellas, though Christmas here started over like 19 hours ago. Still Merry Christmas, and also enjoy the festive holiday of New Year. 

And by the way, I was going to ask, but who think Princess Celestia is secretly a very different kind of person when she's alone? I mean when she decides to take a break and just relax she goes and indulges herself with trashy novels and wine, ice cream and a hot tub?
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549bc9496368724489420600#post_549bc9496368724489420600
Well there is always the "She's the kinky type" idea that's pretty popular.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549bc9496368724489420600#post_549bc9496368724489420600

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549bcaa56368721dd8410300#post_549bcaa56368721dd8410300
I always like the Idea of Celestia just being a complete different person when no ones around.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549bcaa56368721dd8410300#post_549bcaa56368721dd8410300
I don't really mean it like that, I mean is she rather lax when no ones around, with the exclusion of Luna. I mean you can't expect her to be the same person every single day for a thousand years. I expect she's found a clever way to enjoy herself when no one's around. 

Like adjourn the royal court for a day and go off and take a nice bubble bath. Or something. I mean who'd question her?
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549bcb6063687222fade0400#post_549bcb6063687222fade0400
Someone with REALLY big balls.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549bcaf66368720a72741700#post_549bcaf66368720a72741700
That's kinda what I've been trying to say, though not in the sense of acting like Molestia, just being different, I mean she can't constantly be so 'courteous' 24/7.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549bcb7e63687205f0400f00#post_549bcb7e63687205f0400f00
XD That may work, or maybe not. Who knows? But seriously, she'd just make an excuse which would seem reasonable and then go off and magically teleport herself to her room and doze the rest of the day off.

topics.body:
Oh BTW I got this funny piece from a fanfic: 

“Luna tried to rape me in the shower,” Shane noted casually.
“WHAT?!” Luna bellowed in disbelief. “I did NO such thing!”
Celestia’s wings sagged. She was probably a fool for thinking that time spent with her sister and the human would be some sort of respite from the monotony of politics.

topics.body:
You know I'm curious but I've been thinking of doing some funny fanfic involving humans and Equestrians, I titled it Pimp My Castle Equestria. Which is pretty much renovating Equine properties with human furnishings and so forth, or building new properties on purchased lands and making them as wacky or awesome as possible. 

I wanted to do one involving Luna's room and turning it into a penthouse for her, and then getting chased off for making it ridiculously flashy.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6
